snippet: A day after he was absent from team workouts, Harvey arrived on time Wednesday, and Terry Collins said the team had moved past the issue.
lead_paragraph: A day after he was absent from team workouts, Harvey arrived on time Wednesday, and Terry Collins said the team had moved past the issue.

headline.print_headline: With All Eyes on Matt Harvey, Mets Shift Their Focus to Dodgers
headline.main: With All Eyes on Matt Harvey, Mets Shift Their Focus to Dodgers
